description:
Spiderman will have competition when you’re wearing these grippy shoes. With sticky Vibram XS Grip rubber and a supportive double midsole, the Mastia let you transfer all your skill to the wall. The thin 3.5mm sole gives you the sensitivity you need to feel those tiny footholds.

  • Microfibre upper ensures a consistent fit over time
  • Stretchy and breathable bellows tongue conforms to your instep while letting any sweat out to help keep your feet dry
  • Velcro® strap and heel tabs allows for easy on and off
  • 3.5mm curved and split Vibram® XS Grip™ rubber outsole provides exceptional friction and feel
  • 5 micro-layer insole lets you feel all those small movements that make a big difference
  • Friction lock fit keeps you feeling connected for easier heel hooking
  • Precision fit holds your feet like a glove for greater control
name: Tenaya Mastia Rock Shoes - Unisex
